name: Serapis
shortLoreBlurb: Serapis is a deity/sync. from Egypt (Ptolemaic) associated with underworld, healing, sun. Mediates funerary order and soul journeys.
overlapsLinks: Amaterasu (Japan), Anubis (Egyptian), Hades (Greek), Hel (Norse), Inti (Inca), Ra (Egyptian), Surya (Hindu), Yama (Buddhist)
description: Serapis is a deity/sync. from Egypt (Ptolemaic) associated with underworld, healing, sun. Mediates funerary order and soul journeys.
